job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for a Full Stack Developer to join our team at KPN, a leading internet provider. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for the innovation and development of our cutting-edge Digital Assistant.

   Our team is dedicated to creating conversational experiences through web/app and voice channels based on the latest conversational technology within the KPN ecosystem. Our digital assistant provides an intuitive natural language-based experience to millions of KPN's customers and users in the consumer and business domains. We are constantly innovating new use cases and services that impact the lives of our customers.

   As a Full Stack Developer, you will work with a team of experts to develop and maintain:
     * The conversational engine, a Python (Asyncio) backend that handles the connection with the digital assistant platform and for routing live chats and callbacks.
     * You will also be responsible for developing a React/Redux based front-end chat UI that communicates with the conversational engine, which lives on our website (kpn.com) and the mijnkpn apps.
     * Additionally, you will work on a FastAPI based BFF that provides endpoints for the conversational platform to enrich the conversation with customer, product information and integration for specific use cases.

   In addition to these tracks, you will also assist our sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform that they can use within their conversational content.

   What else?

   Our current focus is on adding integrations with KPN systems to improve the digital self-service capabilities of the digital assistant, strengthening the pivotal bridge function to our customer service department with new channels, and making the digital assistant voice-enabled. And last but not least integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant.

   As a Full Stack Developer at KPN, you will play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development. You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views. Our passionate team focuses on continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Developer

We are thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for a Full Stack Developer to join our team at KPN, a leading internet provider. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for the innovation and development of our cutting-edge Digital Assistant.

   Our team is dedicated to creating conversational experiences through web/app and voice channels based on the latest conversational technology within the KPN ecosystem. Our digital assistant provides an intuitive natural language-based experience to millions of KPN's customers and users in the consumer and business domains. We are constantly innovating new use cases and services that impact the lives of our customers.

   As a Full Stack Developer, you will work with a team of experts to develop and maintain:
     * The conversational engine, a Python (Asyncio) backend that handles the connection with the digital assistant platform and for routing live chats and callbacks.
     * You will also be responsible for developing a React/Redux based front-end chat UI that communicates with the conversational engine, which lives on our website (kpn.com) and the mijnkpn apps.
     * Additionally, you will work on a FastAPI based BFF that provides endpoints for the conversational platform to enrich the conversation with customer, product information and integration for specific use cases.

   In addition to these tracks, you will also assist our sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform that they can use within their conversational content.

   What else?

   Our current focus is on adding integrations with KPN systems to improve the digital self-service capabilities of the digital assistant, strengthening the pivotal bridge function to our customer service department with new channels, and making the digital assistant voice-enabled. And last but not least integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant.

   As a Full Stack Developer at KPN, you will play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development. You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views. Our passionate team focuses on continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of a 'Digital Assistant' that provides 'conversational experiences' using 'natural language-based experience' and specifically mentions the 'integration of exciting generative AI capabilities'. The core responsibilities involve building a 'conversational engine' with a Python backend, a React/Redux front-end UI, and a FastAPI-based BFF for enriching conversations. This aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on developing and deploying applications built on generative models, including building user-facing software systems and integrating AI capabilities. While there's software development, the primary focus is on AI-driven conversational applications rather than general predictive modeling.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing and maintaining a React/Redux based front-end chat UI, a Python (Asyncio) backend for the conversational engine, and a FastAPI based BFF. These are core software development activities for building and integrating application components.
job_tasks.phrase: develop and maintain: The conversational engine, a Python (Asyncio) backend that handles the connection with the digital assistant platform and for routing live chats and callbacks. You will also be responsible for developing a React/Redux based front-end chat UI that communicates with the conversational engine, which lives on our website (kpn.com) and the mijnkpn apps. Additionally, you will work on a FastAPI based BFF that provides endpoints for the conversational platform to enrich the conversation with customer, product information and integration for specific use cases.

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly mentions 'integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant' and developing 'conversational experiences' using 'natural language-based experience', which directly relates to working with generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating 'conversational experiences' and a 'natural language-based experience' for customers, which implies working with and potentially fine-tuning language models.
job_tasks.phrase: creating conversational experiences through web/app and voice channels based on the latest conversational technology

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions assisting sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform, which is a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: assist our sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform

job_tasks.justification: The focus on 'continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation' and building 'production-grade' systems for millions of users implies operational aspects of deployment and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation

job_tasks.justification: The role is part of KPN, a 'leading internet provider', and the digital assistant serves 'millions of KPN's customers and users in the consumer and business domains', indicating a need to understand the business context and customer needs.
The job involves innovating 'new use cases and services that impact the lives of our customers', which requires understanding business goals and customer impact.
job_tasks.phrase: innovating new use cases and services that impact the lives of our customers

job_tasks.justification: The role involves making 'architectural decisions' and convincing others, which is a key aspect of software development leadership and design.
job_tasks.phrase: make architectural decisions and convince others of your views

soft_skills.phrase: play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development
make architectural decisions and convince others of your views
work with a team of experts
